description: Paste the copied or cut content.
Select all contents of the current layer.
Cut and move the selected area to a new layer.
Fit the image to the screen.
Temporarily activate Hand Tool to move around the image.
Reset foreground and background colors to black and white.
Switch between foreground and background colors.
Revert the document to its last saved state.
Create a copy of the selection and transform.
Cycle through Shape tools (Rectangle, Ellipse, etc.).
Toggle between the available Shape tools.
Draw a shape from its center.
Maintain the aspect ratio of a shape.
Toggle between the Pen and Freeform Pen tools.
Undo multiple steps of a path or point.
Toggle between viewing the layer mask and layer.
Fill the mask with the foreground color.
Add a shape to the current selection.
Scale the shape uniformly from center.
Modify a handle of a point without affecting the other handle.
Insert a line break without starting a new paragraph.
Select all text in the layer.
Snap document elements to the grid.
Move both the horizontal and vertical guides at once.
Toggle between normal and quick mask modes.
Change blending mode to Vivid Light.
Change blending mode to Hard Mix.
Change blending mode to Color Dodge.
Change blending mode to Soft Light.
